participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Determined and disciplined, Jake is someone who values service and loyalty. He has a practical approach to life and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i'm ex military. my favorite color is navy blue.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is nurturing and friendly, with a passion for caring for others. She has a whimsical side and enjoys stories and adventures, especially those related to Disney.
participant_2.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family.

content.text: Hey! Are you ex military? Because I am.
I like to be in the army
I am a huge fan of the color blue
I like the color green, do you like to go to concerts?
